name: App Store Preview Screenshots
description:
Wondering how your app screenshots would look like in the App Store and showcase to your team?


This template allows you to easily customize:

  1. App title
  2. Brief app description
  3. 5 screenshots
  4. App icon
  5. Company name
  6. Long app description
  7. 2 characters language code


Not only this template will help you customize your app listing, but it can be used to further your ASO strategy.
